analysis.description:
CryptoSurprise.ownerToBagIndices (/unique_chucks/15/0xfc88a9f06f5fe0de2dac95c5fada7a8b3b3d610d.sol#61-65) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- _transferBag (/unique_chucks/15/0xfc88a9f06f5fe0de2dac95c5fada7a8b3b3d610d.sol#330-356)
	- balanceOf (/unique_chucks/15/0xfc88a9f06f5fe0de2dac95c5fada7a8b3b3d610d.sol#394-397)
	- tokenOfOwnerByIndex (/unique_chucks/15/0xfc88a9f06f5fe0de2dac95c5fada7a8b3b3d610d.sol#439-445)

CryptoSurprise (/unique_chucks/15/0xfc88a9f06f5fe0de2dac95c5fada7a8b3b3d610d.sol#8-445) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_chucks/15/0xfc88a9f06f5fe0de2dac95c5fada7a8b3b3d610d.sol#408-414)
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/15/0xfc88a9f06f5fe0de2dac95c5fada7a8b3b3d610d.sol#434-439)

CryptoSurprise._transferBag (/unique_chucks/15/0xfc88a9f06f5fe0de2dac95c5fada7a8b3b3d610d.sol#330-356) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ownerToBagIndices[_from].remove(_bagIndex) (/unique_chucks/15/0xfc88a9f06f5fe0de2dac95c5fada7a8b3b3d610d.sol#348-351)
	-ownerToBagIndices[_to].add(_bagIndex) (/unique_chucks/15/0xfc88a9f06f5fe0de2dac95c5fada7a8b3b3d610d.sol#352)
